system.description: The subject's severed body members (fingers, toes, hands, feet, arms, legs, tails, or even heads of multiheaded creatures), broken bones, and ruined organs grow back. Regeneration is complete in 1 round if severed members are present and touching the creature; otherwise 2d10 rounds. The spell also cures 4d8 points of damage +1 per caster level (max +35), rids the subject of exhaustion and fatigue, and eliminates all nonlethal damage. It has no effect on nonliving creatures (including undead).
